title: M-BTC
author: M-BTC
created_time: September 03, 2023, 09:47:46 AMLast edit: September 29, 2023, 12:20:26 PM by M-BTC
content: I might be looking to sell my 2014 Kialara original, #109 out of 2500*. I haven't seen one being sold in a long time so I guess this topic also serves as a price check.Price: 0.06 BTCPictures: FRONTBACK* The original mintage was 2500 but approximately 1000 pieces were destroyed by Max because they were discontinued. All pieces are numbered xxxx/2500 (source).

comments.author: M-BTC
comments.body: A higher number (#220) is listed on Ebay for $3,000 (https://www.ebay.com/itm/145138083516) so I guess that's a good place to start from. Feel free to make an offer!

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: I do not see any sales of this item (I do not track Ebay) at public auction for 2023Two Silver versions sold on this forum.056 BTC         3/31/2023.06 BTC         4/9/2023

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on September 08, 2023, 04:54:59 PMI do not see any sales of this item (I do not track Ebay) at public auction for 2023Two Silver versions sold on this forum.056 BTC         3/31/2023.06 BTC         4/9/2023You can see past Ebay sales on Worthpoint.com (but gotta sign up).... or can use https://130point.com/ and it will show you the actual price something sold for even if was a "Best Offer Accepted"

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on September 08, 2023, 05:24:19 PMQuote from: Steeley on September 08, 2023, 04:54:59 PMI do not see any sales of this item (I do not track Ebay) at public auction for 2023Two Silver versions sold on this forum.056 BTC         3/31/2023.06 BTC         4/9/2023You can see past Ebay sales on Worthpoint.com (but gotta sign up).... or can use https://130point.com/ and it will show you the actual price something sold for even if was a "Best Offer Accepted" Thanks for this! Worthpoint is on my list to tackle but 130 PT is new to me. Very cool. A quick look showed me that Card Smith card are selling well!

comments.author: M-BTC
comments.body: Bump, price added to the OP.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on September 03, 2023, 12:03:58 PMAwesome piece in what seems to be prestine condition.If I wouldn't have one already in my collection I'd insta-buy for your asking price. Forum sales are pretty low, hope you will find a collector for this historic Kialara piece soon.

comments.author: hoopstagaloop
comments.body: is there any video or photos how to redeem this if funded? looks like a vault to me

comments.author: SatsLife
comments.body: Quote from: hoopstagaloop on October 02, 2023, 03:20:32 PMis there any video or photos how to redeem this if funded? looks like a vault to me   You can find some more info here... https://imgur.com/a/BN6M4 and at kialara.comI'm not sure that I've ever seen a loaded original kialara be sold tbh. Most people who load them plan on keeping them for a very long time. Would be awesome to see an auction for a loaded kialara original!
